metadata.Title: CVE-2023-34623 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered jtidy thru r938 allows attackers to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impacts via crafted object that uses cyclic dependencies.

notes.Note: sbeattie> jtidy and its github fork seem unmaintained. unfixed as of 2023.06.14

criterions.comment: jtidy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
